inbodydescription.para: The reader object in use for the scan
The constructor to run when the plugin is loaded.
Determine what data needs to be copied from the input file to the new output dataset

detaileddescription.para: "Postprocessing" scanner plugin. Reads points from old scan output and re-runs a likelihood containing plugin for those same point. Can perform some simple addition/subtraction operations of likelihood components from the new plugin output.
